name: Castle Cagliostro
desc: Castle Cagliostro is the castle of the illustrious royal family, and the home of the well-loved king Duncan. Unfortunately, the king is currently indisposed due to his tricky court wizard, Zack. Zack, angry ant the king, turned him into a chicken! Now, all the king does is sit on his throne and cluck in anger. His guards can't convince Zack to turn him back, and they have no idea how to turn the king back to normal.
